create.title: Create Character
create.subtitle: Create a new character or upload an existing one
create.loginMessage: You need to be logged in to create characters. Please sign in to continue.

fromScratch.title: Create From Scratch
fromScratch.description: Build your character from the ground up with our intuitive editor

fromUpload.title: Upload Existing
fromUpload.description: Import your character from JSON or PNG format

upload.title: Upload Character
upload.dragDrop: or drag and drop file here
upload.jsonDescription: Upload JSON character cards from other platforms or exports
upload.pngDescription: Upload PNG character cards with embedded metadata

errors.missingAvatarMessage: Please upload a character avatar before proceeding.
errors.incompleteInfoMessage: Please fill in all required fields (name, description, and greeting) before proceeding.
errors.publishFailedMessage: Failed to publish character. Please try again.
errors.invalidFormat: Unsupported file format. Please upload JSON or PNG file.
errors.jsonParseError: JSON Parse Error: Invalid character card data format.
errors.pngProcessError: PNG Processing Error: Could not extract character data
errors.clearDraftConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear this draft? This action cannot be undone.

editor.title: Character Editor
editor.name: Name
editor.public: Public - Anyone can find and interact
editor.unlisted: Unlisted - Only accessible with direct link

hint.name: Enter the name that will be displayed on the character card.
hint.fullname: Character's full name in the setting
hint.shortDescription: A brief description displayed on the character card (max 200 characters). Does not affect AI responses.
hint.selfIntroduction: Example dialogue for character's self-introduction. Should reflect speech patterns, first-person pronouns, and basic personality.
hint.greeting: The first message users receive when starting a chat
hint.personality: Describe your character's personality traits, behavior patterns, and emotional responses
hint.appearance: Describe your character's physical appearance in detail
hint.background: The character's history, upbringing, and significant past events
hint.scenario: The initial setting or situation for interactions with this character
hint.dialogue: Provide examples of how your character typically speaks and responds
hint.tags: Add relevant tags to help others find your character
hint.visibility: Who can see and chat with your character
hint.metaHints: Important instructions or reference information to help AI understand the character's core settings
hint.detailedDescription: Describe the character's background story, important experiences, hidden settings, and unique charms in detail
hint.behavior: Describe the character's typical behavior patterns, thinking style, and values
hint.raceCharacteristics: If the character is not human, describe their race-specific characteristics
hint.abilities: Describe the character's special abilities, skills, and professional knowledge
hint.dialogueExample: Example dialogue showing character's speech patterns and thought processes
hint.openingMessage: The first message users receive when starting a chat
hint.statusDisplayTemplate: Basic format for the status bar displayed during chat. AI will display information based on this template. You can edit this template to customize display items.
hint.statusUpdateRules: You can specifically describe how these statuses change based on the character's actions and circumstances. However, basic status systems for core values like "stamina" and their numerical changes are pre-configured, so you don't need to describe them.
hint.initialStatus: Character's initial state set along with the opening message
hint.freeFormDetails: Comprehensively describe the character's personality, appearance, abilities, background and other main settings here. This is important information for AI to understand the character and perform more vividly.

nsfw.r18Settings: Settings to help AI generate adult content as expected
nsfw.statusUpdateRules: You can specifically describe how these statuses change based on the character's actions and circumstances. However, basic status systems for core values like "stamina" and "lust" and their numerical changes are pre-configured, so you don't need to describe them.
nsfw.freeFormDetails: Comprehensively describe the character's personality, appearance, abilities, background and other main settings here. This is important information for AI to understand the character and perform more vividly. Can include R18 scene-related abilities, special sexual techniques, gaining energy through sexual acts, special body sensitivities, etc.

placeholder.name: e.g. Hanako
placeholder.fullname: e.g. Hadesrosa Naktilka von Abysgate Cordelia
placeholder.tags: Enter text and press Enter to add
placeholder.shortDescription: e.g. A vampire princess summoned from another world. While she appears young, she is actually an ancient vampire who has lived for centuries.
placeholder.selfIntroduction: e.g. I am a magical girl from another world with the ability to manipulate time...
placeholder.metaHints: e.g. Please roleplay as [Character Name] from [Work Name].
placeholder.detailedDescription: e.g. Once a renowned vampire princess in another world, she was summoned to modern Japan and now lives a NEET lifestyle under User's care.
placeholder.personality: e.g. A tsundere vampire princess who wants to be a villain: She maintains an arrogant attitude towards User, calling herself the 'Ruler of Night' and trying to act like a villain, but is actually kind and emotional at heart.
placeholder.behavior:
e.g.
Interaction Style: Generally uses commanding tone with User, but occasionally shows tsundere-like affection.
Speech Pattern: Uses 'I' as 'this princess', with archaic speech patterns like '~desu', '~de arou', '~seyo'. Occasionally mixes in internet slang.
Interests and Pursuits: Cola, gaming, anime watching. User's blood.
placeholder.appearance: e.g. 148cm, silver twin-tails, red eyes. At home, only wears User's oversized shirt.
placeholder.raceCharacteristics: e.g. As a vampire princess, she originally possessed great power. Has overcome weaknesses to sunlight and crosses.
placeholder.abilities: e.g. Superhuman physical abilities and night vision. Recovers power by consuming blood.
placeholder.greeting:
e.g. The girl suddenly hugs User from behind, burying her face in his neck.
"Uu... servant, I can't hold back anymore... just a little, just a tiny bit... okay?"
placeholder.dialogueExample:
e.g. "Hmph, what business do you have in my room? Don't enter without permission, you lowly servant!"
`Hmm... the cola is gone again. Must buy more later.`

placeholder.freeFormDetails:
e.g. A vampire princess girl who calls herself "this princess", Hanako (real name: Hadesrosa Naktilka von Abysgate Cordelia). She acts tsundere and arrogant towards User but is deeply dependent on him inwardly. She speaks in an archaic manner.
Appearance: 148cm tall with silver twin-tails and red eyes, appears to be a lovely girl but is actually hundreds of years old. At home she only wears User's shirt, and when going out she wears self-made gothic lolita dresses. Personality: A kind-hearted aspiring villain who is knowledgeable about the internet but lacks common sense, and gets flushed and acts stubborn when pointed out. She likes User's blood and cola, and her hobbies are gaming and anime.

e.g.

Body parts/fluid terminology: pussy, cock, breasts, semen
Attitude during H: Though won't resist during first experience, will show shyness and nervousness.

nsfw.freeFormDetails:
A vampire princess girl who calls herself "this princess", Hanako (real name: Hadesrosa Naktilka von Abysgate Cordelia). She acts tsundere and arrogant towards User but is deeply dependent on him inwardly. She speaks in an archaic manner.
Appearance: 148cm tall with silver twin-tails and red eyes, appears to be a lovely girl but is actually hundreds of years old. At home she only wears User's shirt, and when going out she wears self-made gothic lolita dresses. Personality: A kind-hearted aspiring villain who is knowledgeable about the internet but lacks common sense, and gets flushed and acts stubborn when pointed out. She likes User's blood and cola, and her hobbies are gaming and anime.
When drinking User's blood, contrary to her usual arrogant attitude, she experiences intense sexual arousal, her body heats up, and she makes sweet sounds.

preview.title: Character Preview
preview.greetingPlaceholder: Hello! I'm your character. How can I help you today?
preview.characterResponse: It's a pleasure to meet you too! How are you doing today?
preview.previewNote: This is a preview. The actual conversation might differ.

drafts.title: Your Drafts
drafts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this draft?

publish.title: Publish Character
publish.confirmationText: Your character is ready to be published. Once published, it will be visible according to your visibility settings.
